about.title: Classical Excellence in a Historic Setting
about.description: Step into the magnificent Chiesa Santa Maria degli Angeli, where centuries of Italian artistry converge in an unforgettable evening of classical masterpieces. Our concerts transport you through time, featuring compositions that defined Italy's musical legacy, performed by distinguished musicians in an authentic baroque setting.

features.title: Intimate Setting
features.description: Experience classical music in the intimate atmosphere of a 16th-century church, where every note resonates with historical significance.

features.title: Curated Program
features.description: Each performance thoughtfully combines beloved classics with known gems of the Italian repertoire, creating a journey through Italy's rich musical heritage.

features.title: Expert Musicians
features.description: Our ensemble comprises accomplished artists dedicated to authentic performance practices, bringing centuries-old compositions to vivid life.

cta.title: Reserve Your Place in Paradise
cta.description: Tickets for our concerts are available through our trusted partners. Don't miss the opportunity to participate in this exceptional musical experience.

groupOffers.description: We also offer special rates and packages for groups. Contact us directly for more information.

footer.brandDescription: Experience the timeless beauty of classical music in the heart of Milan.

hero.title: Experience the Magic
hero.description: Join us for an enchanting evening of live classical music in the heart of Milano. Immerse yourself in the timeless beauty of a live string quartet, surrounded by the historic ambiance of this iconic church.

repertoire.title: Repertoire
repertoire.description: Our carefully curated program includes a selection of iconic works by legendary Italian composers. From the drama of Verdi's operas to the passion of Vivaldi's concertos, each performance is a celebration of Italy's rich musical heritage.

composers.name: Luigi Boccherini
composers.knownFor: String Quintet in E major, Cello Concerto in B-flat major

vision.title: Our Vision & Mission
vision.visionDescription: To create transformative musical experiences that bridge past and present, connecting audiences with Italy's extraordinary cultural heritage through the timeless power of classical music.
missionPoints: Preserving and celebrating Italy's classical music tradition
Making extraordinary musical experiences accessible to all audiences
Supporting emerging artists while honoring historical performance practices
Creating meaningful connections between Italy's architectural and musical heritage
